cause.description:
In Darfur, thousands of innocent lives have been killed. And by who? Their own government. If everyone continues to petition for a no-fly zone in Darfur, perhaps someone of power can help. Women and little girls are being raped and killed, families are being shot, babies are being shot... It's time to put an end to it all.
Go to:
http://www.lifenets.net/nofly/noflywebinar.php
1. Innocents are losing their lives and for what?
2. It's the beginning of a new holocaust.
cause.mission: interfere with their government from killing and raping their own people
cause.name: No-Fly Zone in Darfur
